item.tcondiadema.sacred_relic.line1: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
item.tcondiadema.sacred_relic.get: §4An ancient relic suddenly appeared to protect you.
item.csdy.web_13234.name: just for test
item.tcondiadema.neuron_sensors.line1: It may need to be obtained from golems body
modifier.tcondiadema.forma.flavor: add the Polarity of a slot
modifier.tcondiadema.aura_forma.flavor: add the Aura Polarity of a slot
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_kill_aura.desc:
Can only auto-attack once when entity come in...
You may be a victim of pirated killing aura, please download "L2hostility" get the full service
modifier.tcondiadema.avarita.description: All the blocks in your Diadema will change to Gold ,Pick up them to get AbsorptionAmount
modifier.tcondiadema.superbia.descriptio: Kill all entities in Diadema with a lower max-health than you, and increase your max-health each time.
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_projecte.descr:
Hurt all entities in Diadema 1 damage every tick, EMC will not be added
Maybe in your world chemistry has triumphed over alchemy, download the "ProjectE" to turn things around
modifier.tcondiadema.projecte.descriptio: Hurt all entities in Diadema 1000 damage every tick. And add 1000 EMC
modifier.tcondiadema.wind: No.?-The Thing That Walked on the Wind
modifier.tcondiadema.wind.flavor: Deathwalker ...... Wind God, you walk in the wind...... adoramus te...... adoramus te...... adoramus te......
modifier.tcondiadema.wind.description: Increases evasion chance by 80%, gains gamemode crative flight and quadruple movement/flight speed, and other entities in Diadema Armor return to 0
modifier.tcondiadema.abyss.flavor: I threw him into a place where there was no top and bottom
modifier.tcondiadema.abyss.description: all entities in Diadema Y pos always lower than -500
modifier.tcondiadema.meridia_verse.descr: All entities in Diadema will round and round and round
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_meltdown.descr:
ignite all entities in Diadema(Real All)
You may be in the Middle Ages when atomic technology was not invented, download "Mekanism" to move the world forward
modifier.tcondiadema.meltdown.flavor: I have a dream where I take you by your hammering neck
modifier.tcondiadema.meltdown.descriptio: Hurt all entities in Diadema 2500 LASER damage every tick and radiate them.
modifier.tcondiadema.warden: No.500-The disaster of the ancient city
modifier.tcondiadema.warden.description: Other players in the Diadema are plunged into complete darkness and give the mob a Scared effect, and the mob that tries to escape will be attacked with a sonic boom of 30 damage
modifier.tcondiadema.gula.description: The death of other creatures within the Diadema will increase your max health and attack damage by 0.8 times that of the deceased creature.
modifier.tcondiadema.luxuria.description: All non-player creatures within the Diadema will have their held items replaced with End Rods. The health of all creatures will gradually weaken and be converted into Milk Buckets and Experience Orbs.
modifier.tcondiadema.fake_shinratensei.d:
All creatures within the domain will be slowed.  
You may not have awakened the Rinnegan yet. Download "Cycle" to obtain the power of the Six Paths Sage.
modifier.tcondiadema.shinratensei.descri: Repel all entities within the diadema.
modifier.tcondiadema.time_rain.descripti: Time Rain erodes the lives and clothing of creatures in the Diadema.When fully exposed to the rain, it is the death period
effect.tcondiadema.wind: The Thing That Walked on the Wind
